name: Animated Box
description: The Animated Box component allows the user to create interactive animations.

properties.name: type
properties.label: Animation Type
properties.settingTooltip: Select the animation type of the component.

properties.name: duration
properties.label: Duration
properties.settingTooltip: Duration of the animation, in seconds.

properties.name: delay
properties.label: Delay
properties.settingTooltip: Duration to delay the animation, in seconds.

properties.name: loop
properties.label: Loop
properties.settingTooltip: The number of times the animation should loop, 0 is equivalent to infinite.

eventHandlers.name: onClick
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user clicks on the component.
eventHandlers.label: On Click

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOver
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the mouse pointer hovers over the component.
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Over

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOut
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the mouse pointer leaves the component.
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Out

eventHandlers.name: onCycleComplete
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the component finishes a loop.
eventHandlers.label: On Cycle Complete

eventHandlers.name: onAnimationEnd
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the animation end, only calls if loop is non-zero.
eventHandlers.label: On Animation End
